official_title: A concurrent resolution to urge the Government of the Soviet Union to facilitate the emigration of a Soviet citizen, and for other purposes.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
subjects_top_term: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Urges the Soviet Union to facilitate the emigration of Andrei Frolov. Expresses the sympathy of the Congress to the families of others who have attempted to obtain and been denied exit visas.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution to urge the Government of the Soviet Union to facilitate the emigration of a Soviet citizen, and for other purposes.
